content: in this legal case a court in bari issued a final resolution after a 6year duration the judge ordered the dissolution of a hereditary community involving a building located in fontenuova the ownership of the building was allocated to the defendants with a surplus amount to be paid to the plaintiffs the court applied the civil code specifically articles related to inheritance the plaintiffs claimed they were already coowners due to a previous inheritance while the defendants argued for their ownership share and the value of the property the judge ruled in favor of the defendants considering ownership shares and the right of habitation claimed by one of the defendants the judge also ordered the repayment of rents received by one of the plaintiffs and adjusted the ownership shares accordingly the property was deemed nondivisible and allocated jointly to the defendants the costs of the litigation were fully offset between the parties the judges decision was made on march 14 2007 in the tivoli court
